replies.title: –î–ª—è –£–∫—Ä–∞–∏–Ω—Ü–µ–≤/For Ukrainians
replies.content:
For Ukrainians
Follow this channel for important updates: https://t.me/germanyhelpsukraine
Handbook: https://handbookgermany.de/de/ukraine-info/ua.html

If you're looking for a place to stay, please fill out one of this forms: 
- https://wunderflats.com/page/ukraine/tenants-in-need-ua
- https://www.unterkunft-ukraine.de/request

Or check here: 
- https://www.immobilienscout24.de/lp/hilfe-fuer-die-ukraine.html
- https://www.shelter4ua.com
- https://helppeopleleaveukraine.org
- https://warmes-bett.de
- https://icanhelp.host
- https://www.host4ukraine.com
- https://hospitality-helps.org
- https://everybedhelps.com
